summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 FORD RANGER. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V384000 (AIR BAGS) AND A MANUFACTURER AIR BAG RECALL CAMPAIGN (16B15) FOR THE DRIVER'S AIR BAG INFLATOR REPLACEMENT. THE DEALER (NICK NICHOLAS FORD INC, 2901 FL-44, INVERNESS, FL 34453, (352) 726-1231) WAS NOTIFIED, BUT DID NOT SCHEDULE A RECALL REPAIR AFTER THE CONTACT NOTIFIED THEM MORE THAN THREE TIMES. THE DEALER MADE NO MENTION AS TO WHEN THE REMEDY AND PARTS WOULD BECOME AVAILABLE TO RECEIVE THE REPAIR. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE WARNING INDICATOR FOR THE AIR BAGS ILLUMINATED WHILE WAITING TO RECEIVE THE REPAIRS. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED TO DETERMINE WHEN THE VEHICLE WOULD BE REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS NOT AVAILABLE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE. *TT  UPDATED 8/14/18*JB
